Returns: True if the click was handled
Parameters: ExpandableListView: The ExpandableListConnector where the click happened
View: The view within the expandable list/ListView that was clicked
int: The group position that was clicked
long: The row id of the group that was clicked
onGroupClick(android.widget.ExpandableLi.Description: Callback method to be invoked when a group in this expandable list has been clicked.
onGroupClick(android.widget.ExpandableLi.FullName: public abstract boolean onGroupClick (ExpandableListView parent, View v, int groupPosition, long id)

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a group in this expandable list has been clicked.
